products.title: Memphis Black (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Memphis Black (Blackout) Blackout Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Blackout Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 200mm Max Width: 3000mm (1940mm fabric turned)
 	Min Drop: 300mm Max Drop: 1740mm (3000mm fabric turned)
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Tube: Robust Aluminium Tube
 	Control: Sidewinder or Spring Control
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included

products.title: Memphis FR Black (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Memphis FR Black (Blackout) Flame Retardant Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Flame Retardant Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 5000mm
 	Min Drop: 500mm Max Drop: 4000mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
